author: abcoathup
content: Has an EIP# been assigned for https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/5883

author: orbmis
content:
Hi all! I've just submitted a PR for my first EIP, so still learning the process.  I'm getting an error from the EIP Walidator saying: "error[markdown-link-first]: the first match of the given pattern must be a link"

Has anyone come across this before?  I can't figure out what's throwing the error.

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/actions/runs/3428678213/jobs/5713282730

Any advice much appreciated üôè

author: orbmis
content: P.S. apologies if this isn't the appropriate channel for support

author: samwilsn
content: Hey! That error means you have something like EIP-1234 in your proposal, and it isn't a link to that EIP.

author: orbmis
content: hmm, that's what I thought it meant, but when I change to a link - e.g. [EIP-123](https://eips.ethereum.org/eip-123) - then I get a "non-relevant link" error instead

author: samwilsn
content: I need to fix that error message so it's more helpful...

author: orbmis
content: gotcha - cool, thanks a lot Sam, I'll update it now.
